content: If HMA feature is installed on the system, special upgrade procedure must be followed to ensure nondisruptive SE upgrade. 406 IBM z16 (3931) Technical Guide © Copyright IBM Corp. 2022. All rights reserved. 407 Chapter 10. Hardware Management Console and Support Element The Hardware Management Console (HMC) supports the functions and tasks that are required to manage the IBM Z. When tasks are performed on the HMC, the commands are sent to the Primary Support Element (SE) of the targeted system, which then issues commands to their respective central processor complex (CPC). This chapter describes the newest elements for the HMC and SE. This chapter includes the following topics:  10.1, “Introduction” on page 408  10.2, “HMC and SE changes and new features” on page 409  10.3, “HMC and SE connectivity” on page 423  10.4, “Remote Support Facility” on page 430  10.5, “HMC and SE capabilities” on page 431 10 Tip: The Help function is a good starting point to get more information about
